target.name: checkcvstag

input.message: Have you tagged the CVS repository (y/n)? The Tag to use is CR_Geometry_2

target.fail: - ------------------------------------------------------------ You need to tag the repository before publishing the modules and/or resources and/or bo models. Use: CR_Geometry_2 ------------------------------------------------------------

target.name: isomodules

target.name: isoresources

target.name: publish_isoresources
target.description: Copy HTML for all resources listed in publication_index to publication directory

target.name: all
